title: Did chaos/order tokens get removed from the store?
body: The title says it all, did they get removed? I literally threw 10 euro at riot yesterday to buy some tokens today but can't find them anywhere...

replies.body: The Versus event ended overnight as scheduled, per the [event site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017).  Sorry dude.  :X  For your specific case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  No guarantees, but maybe our billing team can work something out!
